Description: Glazed steatite scarab; glaze worn; pierced longitudinally; engraved elytra, head and legs and on the base a lion and a branch.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Enkomi
Bibliographic references: Jacobsson 1994 / Aegyptiaca from Late Bronze Age Cyprus (No. 272)
Kenna 1971 / Catalogue of the Cypriote Seals of the Bronze Age in the British Museum (No. 65)
Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (P41,44 Pl IV,XI)
